snippet: The Department of Defense has identified 1,907 American service members who have died as a part of the Afghan war and related operations. It confirmed the death of the following American recently.
abstract: Department of Defense confirms the death of an American service member as part of the Afghanistan war and related operations.
lead_paragraph: The Department of Defense has identified 1,907 American service members who have died as a part of the Afghan war and related operations. It confirmed the death of the following American recently.
